Master Answer:
In BC, your son (and anyone else in your family born in 1970 or later) it is recommended to have two doses of the Measles, Mumps, Rubella (MMR) Vaccine. The MMR vaccine is available from most pharmacists, some doctors' offices and local health units. Use the Health unit finder.
Immunization Nurse
Master Question: My son is 11 and has never had a MMR / Measles shot. Does he still need one? It's now in Vancouver area...
